Samurai Gunn 2

By Beau Blyth, Nelson Boles, Valentin Seiche, Doseone, Adam Robezzoli, Evan Hemsley, YellowAfterlife

Featured: July 2022

Play or Learn More

The long awaited sequel to a game that helps make up the DNA of Fantastic Arcade, Samurai Gunn 2! Open Collective

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
